---
title: "Exploratory data analysis"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE
)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
train <- read_csv("../data/train.csv")
```

```{r}
train %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = factor(MSSubClass), y = SalePrice)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
table(train$Street)

train %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Street, y = SalePrice)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
